title: Really bad ping at specific times since 7.22
body: Ever since the update to 7.22 I have been having really bad ping past about 11 pm. It is consistently around 200-250 when it should be 60. I tried ping testers for lol and it said my ping should be about 25 which I don't believe. Anyone else had problems with high ping late at night on NA?

replies.body: I'm having the same problem. I usually have about 30 ping, but it's quadrupled since this patch.

Same problem here... I normally have 20-25ms but I now I'm locked at 63 or 64. It doesn't even change while I'm ingame... Problem is it's way higher than 63/64ms feels like 500 ping. And btw I'm from EUW. Saw EUNE players with same problem.
dude you are so lucky...I usually have 60 ping... now at 200 + every game since that patch. But my wifi is fine...

Having the same problem. Has anyone had any kind of positive response towards this subject?

 Is this ping happening because of the preseason and will be fixed after? 

Should we stop playing league of legends so you can understand this is a real issue?
Yeah, I usually have a ping of 36, and now it is insanely high, like consistantly 500 and gets to the point where I can't rly play...

I have the same problem since this patch and ppl in my games say they have it too. I usually have 21ms, but since this patch it will randomly spike to like 200-400 or even higher. It will spike like every 30 seconds and it's unplayable. If it just stayed at 100 ping or something you could actually play the game, but when it's spiking every 30 seconds and then going back to 21ms you can't even play the game... please fix how does riot let such a huge issue go on.

Last night in one of my games, my ping went up from my usual 30-60 ping (depending on time of day) to around 160, tonight my ping in a game went up to 130 in the beginning before shortly after continuing to slowly climb to over 200. I have now gone through every tooltip and common fix, to re-setting my network, changing ip, flushing dns, I've confirmed now that the problem persists and that it is only affecting league of legends. even the lag report is saying I have had 19 MS latency to their servers in the past day.
Yah, the past 2 days I have had bad ping past 12 at night. It fluctuates between 30 ping and 500... Really frustrating, unplayable!!!

Like the others, I'm experiencing high pings. Usually it's around 70 ms.
last days it became between 150-200 ms around 8pm until 11pm.
Today it's the hell, i had 250 ms all the day with spikes over 5000 ms while the ping is normal with other servers (google and even with speedtest).
it seems to be riot's servers problems.
By the way in training it's around 74 ms but in normals and rankeds it gets to 250 ms.

I'm having this problem also and have no idea why it's happening. I use ethernet, playing on MacBook pro, and it used to give me solid 12~16 pings and now I'm getting 200. Changing DNS seemed to work for a single game, but then ping came back to 150. It did decrease but not a big help. Ran the hextech tool, and the log said I'm getting 23 pings but not really. All other games are fine but only league is giving me a prob. And I have no idea how to fix this :P

Well the sad thing is that it's on Riots end not yours so there isn't much you can do except for wait for them to fix whatever the issue may be. I'm in the same boat as you and all you can do is wait, if you seek help they will give you the same automated response.
yeap and also mine seems to do that after around 10pm too.

Also experiencing massive ping spikes and fps drops since patch 7.22.
Ping is usually a stable 30ms but since the patch it just seems to spike all over the place, reaching in the 1000s mid game.
Fps also, used to average 140fps but since the patch it starts at around 90 and moves down to 60fps by late game.

Hey it sounds like you could be experiencing packet loss, which can show up as sudden spikes like this.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an overview of what's happening, and we can go from there.  Let me know what you find!

I have always had 40 ping, even after patch 7.22. Today in the middle of the game it 
randomly went to 80 and stayed there and still is, whats up?
And also, the longer the game goes on the lower the fps falls.
I've read here that loads of people have that problem, no answer anywhere.
on EUW i had a constant 35 ping. Now my constant ping is at 80 and somtimes it goes down to 72 or even higher to 130. looks just like ur problem.
Yeah, mine was ~43 and now its ~81, weird thing is thats so stable. Also you can feel massive packet loss.
Your log reader doesn't work, just says that the log isn't a netlog or anything it can read.
It's not packet loss. The problem is on your end...everyone is having this problem, you're saying we're all liars and everyone is having packet loss? Nah
Ok but this didn't start until the new patch, and my wifi for everything else works the same. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I normally get between 76-112 ping and since the 7.22 patch came out im averaging 1100-2400 ping (which is quite annoying) if anyone knows how to help this problem id gladly take any advice.
